title: Project Controls
subject: Effective project controls ensure success by balancing oversight with project complexity, optimizing resources to achieve desired outcomes efficiently.
description:
Successful projects begin when proper planning and procedures are implemented systematically.

Project complexity, organizational maturity, team experience, budget, and other factors determine the level of project controls needed. Excessive control can cause project costs to spiral upward and divert resources from more important tasks. Lax control can lead to delays, errors, political repercussions, and diminished project quality. As your agent, we provide the project controls tools and techniques to proactively control costs, schedules, and scope of work to reach the desired outcome.

Through advanced techniques such as earned value management, risk modeling, and performance dashboards, we enhance visibility and control at every phase.

title: Project Risk Management
subject: Our risk assessment experts enhance project success by identifying, analyzing, and mitigating potential delays and disruptions efficiently.
description:
Our risk assessment experts prevent or mitigate costly potential delays and disruptions.

While components of project management – scope management, change management, and cost/schedule controls – are effective individually, an integrated risk management process is essential for successful project execution.

A well-defined and integrated risk management process maximizes value through judicious use of time and money. BCL risk management specialists identify and evaluate project risks, manage risk registers, facilitate qualitative risk assessments, conduct quantitative risk analyses, and develop risk mitigation strategies.

In conjunction with project stakeholders, we develop qualitative risk assessments; integrate those assessments into robust, quantitative cost and schedule risk analyses; and monitor and mitigate risks accordingly.
